abstract: Kit Eaton App Smart column compares applications that help enhance business meetings; recommends photo-editing app Darkroom.
lead_paragraph: Apps can ease the planning and conducting of meetings and make sure you get the most out of them.

headline.main: Tools to Make Meetings More Productive (and Maybe More Pleasant)
headline.print_headline: Making Meetings More Productive (and Maybe More Pleasant)

snippet: Apps can ease the planning and conducting of meetings and make sure you get the most out of them.
